Systems and Layers - Narrowing Focus

11 October 2011

We observed Union Square. We thought about the people there, moving through the space. Now, we're narrowing our focus.

Paul May is a researcher and designer from Dublin, living and working in New York. Find out more about Paul's work or get in touch.
